solution_line_template: The second dose had a wait time of {first_dose_wait_time}/{half_divisor}=<<{first_dose_wait_time}/{half_divisor}={second_dose_wait_time}>>{second_dose_wait_time} minutes
So the total wait time is {first_dose_wait_time}+{second_dose_wait_time}=<<{first_dose_wait_time}+{second_dose_wait_time}={total_wait_time}>>{total_wait_time} minutes
